cases.title: Radiology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Murder Case
cases.description: A Radiology Expert Witness was allowed to testify that the fatal injuries suffered by the victim were a result of severe trauma, and not accidental.

cases.title: Plaintiff's Police Procedure Expert Testifies on Coercive Interrogation
cases.description: The court allowed a Police Procedures Expert Witness to testify in a murder case involving allegations of false confessions.

cases.title: Ninth Circuit Reverses Ruling on Pathology and Oncology Experts
cases.description: An Oncology Expert Witness and a Pathology Expert Witness were allowed to testify when the appellate court looked broadly at their methodology.
